h2_title: How to Use the Five Skandhas
content: You'll see a waterfall in the distance and an archway just before it. Go down to this archway and head inside, where you'll automatically dismount from the cloud. This will take you into Water Curtain Cave, which is the final area of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Use the Five Skandhas'.
The content is as follows:
You'll see a waterfall in the distance and an archway just before it. Go down to this archway and head inside, where you'll automatically dismount from the cloud. This will take you into Water Curtain Cave, which is the final area of the game.
